page.title: 06WETHERBY ART'S FESTIVAL
page.content: Wetherby Art's Festival was founded in 1977 when a group of people at a party decided to bring music, drama and art together as a festival. There is an organizing committee of 12 who decide which shows to have. They pick the amateurs first and then they fill the gaps with professionals. There used to be 18 months between festivals but now it is two years as that is better for organizing purposes. The committee start their planning a year before the festival date. In 1979 all the schools in the area took part, but they no longer do so, although local art's groups still participate. There are special events for children during the day. The main events are usually held at Wetherby High School. The Festival is not a fund raising event. Any profits go into the bank to be used for the next Festival.
